titles.title: Jesus is all the world to me

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus is all the world to me, My Friend in trials sore. I go to Him for blessings, and He gives them o’er and o’er. He sends the sunshine and the rain; He sends the harvest’s golden grain: Sunshine and rain, harvest of grain— He’s my Friend.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus is all the world to me, And true to Him I’ll be. Oh, how could I this Friend deny When He’s so true to me? Following Him I know I’m right; He watches o’er me day and night. Following Him by day and night, He’s my Friend.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus is all the world to me, I want no better friend. I trust Him now; I’ll trust Him when Life’s fleeting days shall end. Beautiful life with such a Friend; Beautiful life that has no end! Eternal life, eternal joy, He’s my Friend.{/lang-eng}
